Database_MSSQL.fuelTankers_last_DateTime_sql: Select top 1 * from FuelTankersData Where Tanker_Id =@VEHID and Created >'2021-02-01 00:00:00' order by Created desc

Database_Ora.fuelTankersData_sql_test: Select PROCESSING_TIME Created,VEHICLE_ID Tanker_id,FUEL3,FUEL4,0 FUEL_T, Decode(S15,null,0,S15) FUEL_OutSUM, 0 FUEL_OutSUM_Err from VIST_CORE_EVENTARCHIVE Where VEHICLE_ID =:param_VEHID and PROCESSING_TIME > to_date(:param_DATE,'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') and ROWNUM < :param_MaxMess_Read order by PROCESSING_TIME DESC
Database_Ora.fuelTankersData_sql: Select PROCESSING_TIME Created,VEHICLE_ID Tanker_id,FUEL3,FUEL4,0 FUEL_T, Decode(S15,null,0,S15) FUEL_OutSUM, 0 FUEL_OutSUM_Err from VIST_CORE_EVENTARCHIVE Where VEHICLE_ID =:param_VEHID and PROCESSING_TIME > to_date(:param_DATE,'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') and ROWNUM < :param_MaxMess_Read order by PROCESSING_TIME DESC
